title: Can't use Chrome split-screen feature to view two tabs simultaneously because Gboard does not appear
content: In order for Chrome split-screen to be useful, I need to be able to type in text fields, but ever since phone updated to Android 11, Gboard does not appear in Chrome split-screen mode, so I obviously cannot type. Seems like a bug. Anyone else had this problem? Any solutions? Should I post this in the Chrome forum?
